text: Mark Philipp Wirtz (3 September 19437 August 2020) was a French pop music record producer, composer, singer, musician, author, and comedian. Wirtz was best known for the never-completed A Teenage Opera concept album. The first single from the planned album, "Excerpt from A Teenage Opera" by Keith West, was a number 2 hit on the UK Singles Chart in September 1967. He was born in Strasbourg, France. Wirtz died of frontotemporal dementia on 7 August 2020, aged 76. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French artists Category:French singers Category:French musicians Category:French comedians Category:Writers from Strasbourg Category:French businesspeople Category:French record producers Category:20th-century French composers Category:21st-century French composers
title: Mark Wirtz
